title: EOD Update
text:
Nov 12
• Updated Patient tags card to add new patient tags
• Updated symptoms and diagnosis drill down to include new patient tags
• Added a new card "Zonal Load (f3/f4)" to the Arike activity Dashboard
• Huddle with Rohit and Vignesh
• Added a new card "Zonal Load (appointments) to Arike Dashboard
• Build drill down for both of them
• Updated Diagnosis Split across patients in facility dashboard

title: EOD Update
text:
